headline.main: U.S. BOMBERS SINK A TANKER IN BURMA; Three Flights of Heavy Aircraft Out of India Hit Shipping in Harbor of Rangoon

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 1 -- Three flights of heavy United States bombers operating out of India in the past four days carried destructive warfare to the Japanese in Burma, with no loss to the Americans, the War Department announced here tonight.
abstract: U S bombers raid Rangoon shipping and Myitkyina airdrome
snippet: WASHINGTON, June 1 -- Three flights of heavy United States bombers operating out of India in the past four days carried destructive warfare to the Japanese in Burma, with no loss to the Americans, the War Department announced here tonight....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
